block.p: MOVIES It's a depressing life: Hollywood is spreading very little cheer this Christmas, releasing films on such dire subjects as AIDS ("Philadelphia"), the Holocaust ("Schindler's List," above) and the Vietnam war ("Heaven and Earth").

PRETENSION Ritzy Ritz crackers: These gourmet-style chocolate-dipped wafers are available as a "limited edition" through the holidays, according to Nabisco. (Suggested retail price for box of 15: $2.69.)
